e1343edd-ce8e-464c-9ede-457eea76081f.description: The PCNSE certification validates the knowledge and skills required for network security engineers who design, deploy, operate, manage, and troubleshoot Palo Alto Networks firewalls. PCNSE certified individuals have demonstrated in-depth knowledge of the Palo Alto Networks product portfolio and can make full use of it in the vast majority of implementations. The PCNSE validates that engineers can correctly deploy firewalls while leveraging the rest of the platform.
e1343edd-ce8e-464c-9ede-457eea76081f.name: Palo Alto Networks Certified Network Security Engineer

6d9bd115-1a77-4f53-8e37-91d158c342e9.description: The PCNSA certification validates the knowledge and skills required for network security administrators responsible for deploying and operating Palo Alto Networks firewalls. PCNSA certified individuals have demonstrated knowledge of the Palo Alto Networks NGFW feature set and in the Palo Alto Networks product portfolio core components. The PCNSA seeks to identify people who can operate Palo Alto Networks firewalls to protect networks from cutting-edge cyber threats.

5bf74172-fa82-4a9b-9512-2f2601799c1f.name: CPSP Vertical Enablement - Manufacturing Prisma

badge_template_activities.title: Candidates must complete the CPSP Vertical Enablement Learning Path and pass the assessment to earn the CPSP Vertical Enablement - Manufacturing Prisma Badge of Completion

0a4e8e36-b7b7-434f-a6c0-1c607a3246f9.description: CYBERFORCE is an elite group of proven cybersecurity engineers trusted for their expertise, always putting the customer first, and focused on preventing successful cyber attacks. Recognized among the best-of-the-best by Palo Alto Networks, within the NextWave partner engineering community. CYBERFORCE Sentry focuses on post-sales and holds advanced certifications with key learnings focused on SASE deployments.
0a4e8e36-b7b7-434f-a6c0-1c607a3246f9.name: CYBERFORCE: Sentry

badge_template_activities.title: PCNSE, PCNSC, PCSAE, PCCSE, or PCDRA. Firewall Configuration & Management and Panorama Managing Firewalls. Prisma SD-WAN Design & Operation, Prisma Access, Cortex XDR Prevention, Analysis & Response, Cortex XDR Investigation & Response, or Cortex XSOAR Automations

skills.name: Cortex XSOAR Automation and Orchestration Enablment

d24fbfa2-917c-4964-a548-1174561c4114.description: CYBERFORCE is an elite group of cybersecurity engineers trusted for their expertise, putting the customer first, and focused on preventing successful cyber attacks.
